articles.content: Starting Sunday, Team India would look to start afresh against the West Indies and look to put the disappointment of the South Africa series on the backburner. India squandered the advantage of winni… [+1974 chars]

articles.title: Chinese president addresses IOC session opening via video link - CGTN
articles.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping addressed the opening ceremony of the 139th session of the International Olympic Committee via video link on Thursday. "The world is turning its eyes to China, and China is ready," he said.
articles.content:
The Beijing Winter Olympics will raise the curtain on Friday, with thousands of athletes from across the globe joining the mega sports event in the Chinese capital city.
